        Returns:

        Returns:

      • giveRole

        Parameters:

        memberId - id of the teamMember

        user - the user
        Returns:

      • areUserTeammate

        public boolean areUserTeammate​(User a,
                               User b)
        Are two user teammate?
        Parameters:
        a - a user
        b - another user
        Returns:
        true if both user are both member of the same team

      • setInvolvementLevelForMember

        public void setInvolvementLevelForMember​(Long cardId,
                                         Long memberId,
                                         InvolvementLevel level)
        Change a member involvement level regarding to a card. If the given level is null, involvement will be destroyed and effective involvement will be inherited from roles or super-card
        Parameters:
        cardId - id of the card
        memberId - id of the member
        level - the level

      • setInvolvementLevelForRole

        public void setInvolvementLevelForRole​(Long cardId,
                                       Long roleId,
                                       InvolvementLevel level)
        Change a role involvement level regarding to a card. If the given level is null, involvement will be destroyed and effective involvement will be inherited super-card
        Parameters:
        cardId - id of the card
        roleId - id of the role
        level - the level

      • getEffectiveInvolvementLevel

        public InvolvementLevel getEffectiveInvolvementLevel​(Card card,
                                                     TeamMember member)
        Get the access-control linked to the given member and card
        Parameters:
        member - the member
        card - card
        Returns:
        the access-control the member has to the card, null if none is defined

      • getAccessControlList

        public List<AccessControl> getAccessControlList​(Long cardId)
        Get access control list for the given card
        Parameters:
        cardId - id of the card
        Returns:
        the of access control for the given card
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - 404 if the card does not exist

      • assertTeamIntegrity

        public void assertTeamIntegrity​(Project project)
        Make sure the team of a project make sense. It means:
        • at least one "owner"
        Parameters:
        project - the project to check
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - id team is broken
